attributes.action: stop any action to reduce the compensation paid to wounded Service personnel.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The has been recent speculation in the Media and on the Internet about the Government reducing the compensation to wounded service men and women. 

This would be slap in the face, to those, who face the possility of being mamined on a daily basis for the sake of their country.

It would also show to the voting public, how penny pinching the present government is.
